description:
Enterprise today needs to be able to identify and assess the impact of the technology risk on the resilience of the enterprise to allow them to respond to these issues in a cost-efficient, effective and sustainable way. The module
consists of three broad aspects, namely, (a) identification and understanding of the drivers of technology risk & resilience, (b) the foundational elements of technology risk & resilience framework, and (c) how enterprises implement technology risk and cyber resilience framework in the real world.
title: Technology Risk & Cyber Resilience
